tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor hari was recommended to me by many people. I got my joint replaced by him. I was so pleased with the post operation results. I am so much better and active now. Daily activity which was so painful before has become easy now. I would want to give him all my blessing for a bright future ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
True to its name 'Truheal' ** *** **** ****** ****** **** ******* *** helps the patient's with humility,humanity,compassion,care and love, they heal them not only physically but emotionally by giving them positivity and hope. Dr. Hari is the most remarkable, experienced, compassionate *** *** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** **** ** ************** i have no words to thank him for the way he treated my grandmother's case, he gave her a new life, and by Gods grace and Hari Sir's magical hands she is doing well , my family will always be thankful to Sir for this. Equally amazing is Dr. Aarushi who is passionate caring and helps her patients by spreading smile. She is an epitome of humanity and all the values a doctor must have.
We are privileged to have doctor's like them in our city giving us best services, who are not only the master's in their profession but amazing humans.

review: Dr. Hari operated on my father for fracture in leg. He did a tremendous job, by taking up a high risk surgery, for an old aged patient. He is a very generous, humble and compassionate doctor, who ensures patient comfort always. I highly recommend him for all orthopaedic needs.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** *** ** *********** *** **** ** *** **** ********** ******** 2 years back, my grandmother has undergone a hip surgery. Dr. Hari handled her case and everything went well pre and post surgery. The regular interactions with the patient and taking care of small small problems restores the patient's trust in him. By far, he is one of the most genuine doctors I have came across.
